attributes.action: Terminate Royal Mail's contract and offer it to another, well-equipped company
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the government to replace Royal Mail as the primary 'to-door' service with some other company, such as TNT or DHL, via public tendering process, as Royal Mail are proving time and again to fail their targets, provide anywhere near decent customer service and cause their own staff to strike.
